coded_answer.p: I received your letter congratulating me on having won the first prize in your competition. I am extremely excited about the opportunity to go to your camp in the USA.

Firstly, I have to say that I am studying at University and I wonder if I could travel onin July because of the exams I have onin May. Apart from thatAlso I would not be able to travel there until the end of June.
It does not matter to me whether I stay in a tent or a log cabin, but I would prefer a tent so as to be much more inin closer contact with the wild lifewildlife and nature.

The activities I'd like to do most are playing basketball and Climbing. The first one because I have been playedplaying basketball since the age of twelve and the second one because there are not many places where to go climbing in my city.
Finally, I would like askto ask you if I have to take my own clothes with me or if you will provide me with some, and about the amount of money needed.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
